SEARCH
Package nz.ac.wgtn.swen225.lc.render

Class InfoImplement

java.lang.Object
nz.ac.wgtn.swen225.lc.render.InfoImplement
public class InfoImplement extends Object
responsible for managing and displaying information messages on the game's JPanel when the player reaches certain locations.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    InfoImplement(JPanel jPanel)
    sets up the JTextArea for displaying information and configures its appearance and layout within the provided JPanel.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    fillAction(Graphics g, GameState gameState)
    Fills the action map with tasks that should be executed when the player reaches certain tiles.
    void
    locationMatch(GameState gameState)
    Matches the player's current location to an action in the locationActionMap, and if a match is found, executes the associated action to display information.
    void
    showInfo(Graphics g, String text)
    Displays a warning icon along with the provided text on the game screen.
    static void
    unvisiableTextArea()
    make the textArea unseen

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • InfoImplement

      public InfoImplement(JPanel jPanel)
      sets up the JTextArea for displaying information and configures its appearance and layout within the provided JPanel.
      Parameters:
      jPanel - the JPanel where the information will be displayed.

  • Method Details

    • showInfo

      public void showInfo(Graphics g, String text) throws IOException
      Displays a warning icon along with the provided text on the game screen.
      Parameters:
      g - the Graphics object used to draw the image.
      text - the text to display in the text area.
      Throws:
      IOException - if there is an error loading the warning image.

    • fillAction

      public void fillAction(Graphics g, GameState gameState)
      Fills the action map with tasks that should be executed when the player reaches certain tiles. It finds all tiles containing an Info item and maps their locations to actions that display the related information.
      Parameters:
      g - the Graphics object used to draw the info.
      gameState - the current state of the game.

    • locationMatch

      public void locationMatch(GameState gameState)
      Matches the player's current location to an action in the locationActionMap, and if a match is found, executes the associated action to display information. Clears the action map after execution.
      Parameters:
      gameState - the current state of the game.

    • unvisiableTextArea

      public static void unvisiableTextArea()
      make the textArea unseen
